cleaned_text:
SUNRISE FAMILY CLINIC
123 Lake Rd, Colombo 00700 | +94 11 234 5678

OUTPATIENT ENCOUNTER NOTE
Document ID: MR-2025-08-23-001
Created: 2025-08-23T18:10:56+05:30

PATIENT
Name: James MRN: JMS-000873
DOB: 1990-05-12 Sex: Male
Contact: +94 76 123 4567 | james@example.com

ENCOUNTER
ID: ENC-2025-08-23-1142
Date/Time: 2025-08-23T18:10:56+05:30 Location: Room 3
Provider: Dr. Aisha Fernando, MBBS (SLMC-458721)
Reason for visit: Cough and sore throat for 3 days

HISTORY
CC: “Sore throat, dry cough, mild fever” × 3 days.
HPI: Gradual onset after a cold exposure; no dyspnea, chest pain, or rash. Hydration adequate. OTC
lozenges with partial relief.
PMH: Allergic rhinitis
PSH: None
FHx: Father: hypertension, Mother: hypothyroidism

SHx: Tobacco=Never; Alcohol=Occasional; Occupation=Software engineer
Immunizations: COVID-19 primary series + booster (2023), Influenza (2024)
Medications: Cetirizine 10 mg
Allergies: Penicillin (Rash)

VITALS
Ht: 178 cm Wt: 78.0 kg BMI: 24.6
T: 37.6 °C HR: 88 bpm RR: 16 bpm
BP: 126/78 SpO₂: 98% Pain: 3/10

PHYSICAL EXAM
General: Alert, no acute distress.
HEENT: Oropharynx erythematous, no exudates; nasal mucosa boggy; no cervical lymphadenopathy.
Chest/Lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes or crackles.
Cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs.
Skin: Normal turgor, no rashes.

TESTS
Point-of-care:
 - Rapid Strep A (LOINC 6558-1): Negative
Laboratory:
 - WBC (LOINC 6690-2): 10.8 x10^9/L (ref 4.0-10.0) [H]
 - CRP (LOINC 1988-5): 8.0 mg/L (ref <5) [H]
 - Hemoglobin (LOINC 718-7): 14.6 g/dL (ref 13.0-17.0)
Imaging: None


ASSESSMENT
 1) Acute pharyngitis, likely viral (ICD-10 J02.9)
 2) Allergic rhinitis (ICD-10 J30.9)

PLAN
 - Supportive care: rest, hydration, warm saline gargles.
 - Paracetamol 500 mg PO q6h PRN fever/pain (max 4 g/day).
 - Throat lozenges PRN.
 - Return if fever >38.5°C beyond 48-72h, dyspnea, drooling, or worsening symptoms.
 - Follow-up in 5 days or earlier if needed.
 Orders: Paracetamol 500 mg #20; Throat culture PRN if persistent symptoms.

SIGN-OFF
Electronically signed by Dr. Aisha Fernando at 2025-08-23T18:10:56+05:30
(Electronically signed - no changes after signature.)

*** TESTING NOTE: This is a synthetic record for software testing only. ***
